# Atanh
<!-- This file was generated - DO NOT CHANGE IT MANUALLY -->



Excel ATANH(number): Returns the inverse hyperbolic tangent of the given number. (Angle is returned in radians.)

## Parameter

### Function name

The name of the Excel function

- ID: `functionName`
- Datatype: `string`
- Default Value: `ATANH`





## Advanced Parameter

`None`
